data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3154707,"name":"Morgan Nash","username":"MMNASH10","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mmnash10/{size}/159852_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-28T20:01:27.504Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eI’ve been trying to change the colors of the theme in Shuffleboard to match my team’s colors. I have read this \u003ca href=\"https://frcdocs.wpi.edu/en/stable/docs/software/dashboards/shuffleboard/custom-widgets/custom-themes.html\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003epage\u003c/a\u003e and somewhat understand what needs to be done, but I am not very familiar with CSS. I am not sure where the CSS files exist that I would need to modify. Can they be added into a specific project I’m making, or are they somewhere else? Any help would be appreciated; I just need somewhere to start. Thanks.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2023-02-28T20:01:27.504Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":36,"reads":105,"readers_count":104,"score":216.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":428453,"topic_slug":"customizing-shuffleboard-color-with-css","display_username":"Morgan Nash","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://frcdocs.wpi.edu/en/stable/docs/software/dashboards/shuffleboard/custom-widgets/custom-themes.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Custom Themes — FIRST Robotics Competition documentation","clicks":28}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":49517,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4509 Programmer"},"post_url":"/t/customizing-shuffleboard-color-with-css/428453/1","custom_user_title":"4509 Programmer","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3154762,"name":null,"username":"Starlight220","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/starlight220/{size}/150872_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-28T21:03:23.700Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThe docs page says that CSS files should be in \u003ccode\u003e~/Shuffleboard/themes/mytheme/\u003c/code\u003e (replace \u003ccode\u003emytheme\u003c/code\u003e with the name of the theme you want to add; \u003ccode\u003e~/\u003c/code\u003e on Windows is \u003ccode\u003eC:/Users/\u0026lt;youruser\u0026gt;/\u003c/code\u003e).\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2023-02-28T21:03:23.700Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":66,"readers_count":65,"score":18.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":428453,"topic_slug":"customizing-shuffleboard-color-with-css","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":45763,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"6738a | ISR | WPILib"},"post_url":"/t/customizing-shuffleboard-color-with-css/428453/2","custom_user_title":"6738a | ISR | WPILib","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3154860,"name":"Sam Carlberg","username":"SamCarlberg","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/samcarlberg/{size}/207684_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-28T23:22:18.662Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eYou’d create a new directory in - assuming a Windows computer - \u003ccode\u003eC:\\Users\\\u0026lt;username\u0026gt;\\Shuffleboard\\themes\\\u0026lt;theme name\u0026gt;\u003c/code\u003e. For example, \u003ccode\u003eC:\\Users\\Sam\\Shuffleboard\\themes\\Example Theme\u003c/code\u003e.  Then you can add however many \u003ccode\u003e.css\u003c/code\u003e files you like in that directory. Note that you’re \u003cem\u003enot\u003c/em\u003e modifying existing files! You’re just creating new files that can override the default settings\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThose CSS files have to follow the JavaFX CSS syntax, which is essentially vanilla CSS with JavaFX-specific properties like \u003ccode\u003e-fx-background-color\u003c/code\u003e instead of \u003ccode\u003ebackground-color\u003c/code\u003e (you won’t be able to do fancy things like flex layouts or animations with it, though). \u003ca href=\"https://openjfx.io/javadoc/11/javafx.graphics/javafx/scene/doc-files/cssref.html\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003eHere’s the official documentation\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eIf you want to modify an existing theme (for example, the default one), you’ll need to include an \u003ccode\u003e@import\u003c/code\u003e directive at the top of the file to pull in all of its definitions.  The WPILib documentation page has instructions for which files to include for which themes. You can also open the source code for those themes to see how different elements get styled. Generally, you should at least be importing the \u003ccode\u003ebase.css\u003c/code\u003e file to get styling from the material design stylesheet as well as the built-in shuffleboard styles.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2023-02-28T23:25:05.795Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":42,"readers_count":41,"score":23.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":428453,"topic_slug":"customizing-shuffleboard-color-with-css","display_username":"Sam Carlberg","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://openjfx.io/javadoc/11/javafx.graphics/javafx/scene/doc-files/cssref.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"JavaFX CSS Reference Guide","clicks":10}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":25916,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2084 Lead Mentor | WPILib Developer"},"post_url":"/t/customizing-shuffleboard-color-with-css/428453/3","custom_user_title":"2084 Lead Mentor | WPILib Developer","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3320106,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2024-02-28T23:23:15.963Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
